gib_gibraltar_desc;The Rock of Gibraltar sits fortified at the mouth of the Mediterranean Sea at its narrowest point
column2: allowing its owner complete control over naval movement into and out of the maritime heart of Europe. Ever since our ignominious defeat during the Succession War of 1700
column3: the perfidious British have held this vital fortification despite our best efforts at reclaiming it and now hold Mediterranean commerce as their captive. If we are to ever truly reclaim our ancestral greatness
column4: we must correct this ancestral wrong
column5: even if it brings us to war with those who occupy Gibraltar.;;;;;;;;;;;x
